Text.val: This program produces a list of invoice copies which are to be sent to the user
Prints for 1 selected MQDT row or all MQDT rows
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Moved OMQ124A to proper palce in program repository
08.06.2006 AK SCR11397 use SCHT_SCHEDDATEREGISTERED as key date (if exist)
10.02.2006 AK SCR9243 change the sort indicator of the list + change link to
link join in order to sort the list by INVO_SCHEDULEDATE
